verbs.description: [ARG0: The North Korean government] [ARGM-ADV: completely] [V: ignored] [ARG1: the Trump administration 's efforts to nail down details of a planned June 12 nuclear arms summit in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: effectively disappearing in the middle of pre - meeting protocol negotiations] .

The North Korean government completely ignored the Trump administration 's efforts to [V: nail] down [ARG1: details of a planned June 12 nuclear arms summit in Singapore] , effectively disappearing in the middle of pre - meeting protocol negotiations .

The North Korean government completely ignored the Trump administration 's efforts to nail down details of a [V: planned] [ARG1: June 12 nuclear arms summit] in Singapore , effectively disappearing in the middle of pre - meeting protocol negotiations .

[ARG1: The North Korean government] completely ignored the Trump administration 's efforts to nail down details of a planned June 12 nuclear arms summit in Singapore , [ARGM-MNR: effectively] [V: disappearing] [ARGM-LOC: in the middle of pre - meeting protocol negotiations] .
